About

Hi, I'm Sebastian! I'm a Computer Science student at Temple University with a passion for AI, HCI, and LLMs. I'm currently working on a few projects, including a Discord chatbot, a speech-to-speech conversational chatbot, and a few other things. I'm also a researcher at the Temple HCI Lab, where I work on projects in HCI, AI, and LLMs with design thinking and user feedback to guide innovative development. I'm also a member of the Temple ACM chapter, where I work on projects and participate in events.
